name: University of Iowa Hospitals & Clinics
notes: Iowa's only comprehensive academic medical center, operated by State Board of Regents; affiliated with Carver College of Medicine

name: The Ohio State University Wexner Medical Center
notes: State-operated academic medical center with seven hospitals; affiliated with Ohio State College of Medicine

name: Michigan Medicine - University of Michigan Health
notes: Public university academic medical center operated by University of Michigan; includes University Hospital, C.S. Mott Children's Hospital
